 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָעַר‎</span>] **verb** ==be, or grow, insignificant== (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זער‎</span>; Late Hebrew ***id.***, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒe—êru***</u></abbr>, ***be small***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be insignificant, despicable***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְעַר‎</span> transitive***despise, revile***; — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּבֵד‎</span>), 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְעֲרוּ‎</span> [[Job.14.21|Job 14:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְעָ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Jer.30.19|Jer 30:19]] ***Participle*** as substantive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצֹּעֲרִים‎</span> [[Zech.13.7|Zech 13:7]] (i.e. sheep, in figure, compare [[BDB#Now|Now]]).
